MESSENGER_APP_SECRET.description: In your Facebook app, click Settings | Show. Type in your password and click Submit. Use that value here.

MESSENGER_PAGE_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: Click Messenger under Products in your Facebook app. Scroll down to Token Generation. Then, under Page select your Page. In the popup, click Continue as yourUsername | OK.  Click the Page Access Token to copy it and paste it here.

MESSENGER_VALIDATION_TOKEN.description: This is a developer-defined value. Use something like - UCVeriToken1. This will be used when you setup webhooks.

SERVER_URL.description: This will be in the format https://yourAppName.herokuapp.com/. Be sure to use your own app name.

CONSUMER_KEY.description: Use your Salesforce Connected App's consumer key.

CONSUMER_SECRET.description: Use your Salesforce Connected App's consumer secret.
